nodes.text: Ielo was a small ice moon located near the Outer Rim Territories planet Batuu. Around 34 ABY, the Batuuan farmer Julen Rakab briefly visited the moon with his friend Izal Garsea, and was amazed at the sight of snow. They left the moon after an hour, eventually returning to Batuu.
Ielo was mentioned in A Crash of Fate, a 2019 novel written by Zoraida Córdova.
